primitives.operators

Class SupportOperators

  • java.lang.Object
    • primitives.operators.SupportOperators

  • public class SupportOperators
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to support Operators primitives with common methods.
    Author:
    Marcos Almendres.

      • continuousParamsUniverse

        public static Tuple<FuzzySet> continuousParamsUniverse(org.nlogo.api.LogoList l)
        Calculate the parameters and the universe of continuous sets.
        Parameters:
        l - Logolist containing all the fuzzysets.
        Returns:
        A tuple containing the resulting parameters(List) and the universe(double[]).

      • allType

        public static int allType(org.nlogo.api.LogoList l)
        Checks the type of all the fuzzy sets.
        Parameters:
        l - The list where the fuzzy sets are.
        Returns:
        1 if all discrete, 2 if all piecewise, 3 if all continuous or 0 if all the sets are not the same type.

      • discreteOperations

        public static Tuple<double[]> discreteOperations(org.nlogo.api.LogoList l,
                                 Command operator)
        Calculate the parameters and the universe of discrete operations.
        Parameters:
        l - the list where the sets are.
        operator - The operation to perform.
        Returns:
        A tuple containing the resulting parameters(List) and universe(double[]).

      • discretePairOperation

        public static java.util.List<double[]> discretePairOperation(java.util.List<double[]> a,
                                             java.util.List<double[]> b,
                                             Command operator)
        Calculate the parameters of two discrete fuzzysets.
        Parameters:
        a - The parameters of the first fuzzy set.
        b - The parameters of the second fuzzy set.
        operator - The operation to perform.
        Returns:
        The resulting parameters.

      • buildLabel

        public static java.lang.String buildLabel(org.nlogo.api.LogoList l,
                          java.lang.String operation)
        Build the label of the operation sets.
        Parameters:
        l - The list with the fuzzy sets.
        operation - The string to concatenate the set's label.
        Returns:
        The resulting string.
